Title: Andrew can see a label with a title
Description:
**WHEN** Andrew launches the application
**THEN** He should see a title labeled "Flickr for Android"

**ACCEPTANCE**
- A title set to "Flickr for Android" is visible at the top of the screen
- Title should be centered on the screen
- Title should be 24sp

Title: Andrew can see a list of descriptions displayed in a grid
Description:
**WHEN** Andrew launches the application
**THEN** He should see a list of items with text describing a Flickr Image (placeholder text for now)

**ACCEPTANCE**
- A grid list is used with 3 columns
- Each list item has placeholder description saying "Flickr"
- Text should be centered horizontally
- Grid list contains 7 placeholder list items to ensure there are 3 columns

**HELPFUL LINKS**
- [RecyclerView](
https://developer.android.com/reference/android/support/v7/widget/RecyclerView.html)
- [RecyclerView.Adapter](https://developer.android.com/reference/android/support/v7/widget/RecyclerView.Adapter.html)
- [RecyclerView.ViewHolder](https://developer.android.com/reference/android/support/v7/widget/RecyclerView.ViewHolder.html)
- [RecyclerView.LayoutManager](https://developer.android.com/reference/android/support/v7/widget/RecyclerView.LayoutManager.html)

Title: Andrew can see a placeholder image in each list item
Description:
**WHEN** Andrew launches the application
**THEN** He should see a placeholder image centered in each list item

**ACCEPTANCE**
- Each list item should have an image centered horizontally
- The image should be placed above the text
- Image should be loaded using an image loading library

**HELPFUL LINKS**
- [Picasso](http://square.github.io/picasso/)
- [LinearLayout](https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/ui/layout/linear.html)

Title: Andrew can see the image and description populated from Flickr's Public API
Description:
**WHEN** Andrew launches the application
**THEN** He should see the image and title populated in the grid list view

**ACCEPTANCE**
- Image should be populated using the media link from the Flickr API
- Text should be populated using the title field from the Flickr API

**NOTE**
Use the following public API from Flickr:
- http://api.flickr.com/services/feeds/photos_public.gne?format=json&nojsoncallback=true


**HELPFUL LINKS**
- [Retrofit](http://square.github.io/retrofit/)
